snippet.title: Blast Brigade — Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Blast off for an all-new 2D metroidvania adventure in Blast Brigade vs. The Evil Legion of Dr. Cread, out now on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam, MY.GAMES Store and GOG.com.

Check out the official website: https://blastbrigade.com
